summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Haergo HR System Phase 1 MVP. All backend APIs working perfectly (100% success rate). Frontend testing successful with all major features functional including login, dashboard, employee management, departments, positions, user management, profile, and logout.
passed_tests: Backend API - Seed Data Creation (10 employees, 5 departments, 11 positions)
Backend API - Employees CRUD operations with search
Frontend - Login page loading and form validation
Frontend - Admin login with correct credentials
Frontend - Dashboard statistics display (10 employees, 5 departments, 11 positions)
Frontend - Positions page (11 positions with filtering)
Frontend - Users management page (2 users displayed)
Frontend - Profile page access via dropdown menu
Frontend - Logout functionality via dropdown menu
Frontend - Sidebar navigation between all pages
